title: Exploring Synthesizer Envelopes with the 4MS EnvVCA
description:
Let's explore how envelopes work in synthesis, ok?
Featuring the 4MS Dual EnvVCA and EnvVCA.
Dual EnvVCA: https://shrsl.com/3ts10
EnvVCA: https://shrsl.com/3ts14
